channel.title: Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat on Percona Community
channel.description: Recent content in Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat on Percona Community

item.title: Finding Poorly Designed Schema's and How to Fix Them - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - Sept 30th
item.description: Percona Community Live Stream for MySQL will focus on Finding Poorly Designed Schema’s and How to Fix Them. This is a part of our bi-weekly meetup to develop open-source database skills. Come up with your questions and get an answer straight forward to all your questions. Add this event to your Google Calendar. VIDEO Link: https://youtu.be/PDYWBDGLBE0 TRANSCRIPT Dave Stokes: This is a podcast or stream cast we’re doing on finding poorly designed schemas, featuring Marcos Albe, who is our resident expert.

item.title: MySQL Designing a Schema - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - Sept 2nd
item.description: Percona Community Live Stream for MySQL will focus on Designing a Schema. This is a part of our bi-weekly meetup to develop open-source database skills. Come up with your questions and get an answer straight forward to all your questions. Video Link: https://youtu.be/PEa3cBKwAI4 Transcript Dave Stokes: Good Morning, good evening, good afternoon, good whatever it is, wherever you are. I’m Dave Stokes from Percona and with me is Marcos Albe.

item.title: Setting Up Backups and Scheduling Regular MySQL Backups - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - June 10th
item.description: Learn more about Backup best practices to ensure the availability of your database. This is a part of the bi-weekly live-streamed meetup dedicated to MySQL. Video Link: https://youtu.be/6Ai149MDjFo Transcript

item.title: Setting Up Alerts and Basic Automation for MySQL - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - May, 27th
item.description: Percona Community live stream for MySQL is back. Matt Yonkovit and Marcos Albe talked about Setting Up Alerts and Basic Automation for MySQL during the session of May 27th. Check full recording and transcript! Follow us on Twitter and stay tuned to all upcoming Percona events. Video Link: https://youtu.be/0fhiioT0Tbg Transcript

item.title: Observing & Tuning Your MySQL Workload Using PMM - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - April, 29th
item.description: Percona Community live stream for MySQL is a biweekly events with Matt Yonkovit and Marcos Albe. This is the recording for the session of April, 29th. We have talked about Observing & Tuning Your MySQL Workload Using PMM (Percona Monitoring and Management). Follow us on Twitter and stay tuned to all upcoming Percona events. Video Link: https://youtu.be/4ccEZZtjqWg Transcript

item.title: Installing MySQL and Setting Up a Default Configuration - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - April, 1st
item.description: Watch out this recording from Percona Community live stream of April 1st. Learn how to install MySQL and Setting Up a Default Configuration with Matt Yonkovit and Marcos Albe. This is a series of live stream to discuss MySQL tricks with experts. Video Link: https://youtu.be/AMGNklpAjJ8 Transcript Matt Yonkovit: We might even be live right now. Marcos, we might be live oh we are live oh we see now we’re live there we popped in.

item.title: Installing and Setting Up MySQL on Kubernetes - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - August 19th
item.description: Start running MySQL on Kubernetes with the lead of Percona Experts. Dave and Marcos were at the Community Live stream to share some tips and tricks. Video Link: https://youtu.be/VflG2XicCCE Transcript

item.title: Migrating MySQL to a New Server - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - August 5th
item.description: Our experts run a demo and took us through all steps to migrate MySQL database to a new server. Get more tips to improve your database skill with Dave Stokes and Marcos Albe. Video Link: https://youtu.be/QQJMGONBwWw Transcript

item.title: Setting Up Failover via a Replica for MySQL - Percona Community MySQL Live Stream & Chat - July 8th
item.description: This Community Live Stream is talking about Failover and Replica for MySQL. Our experts Dave Stokes and Marcos Albe took us through the setting to make it easier. Video Link: https://youtu.be/c5tj-0THNLI Transcript
